main event: Observations of an unidentified flying object at Bryan Air Force Base in Texas on 17 June 1955.
interesting points: The object was tracked by an aircraft and observed by multiple weather personnel,The object was visually confirmed between 0624Z and 0638Z and was seen moving at an estimated speed of 600 KPH,The characteristics of the object suggested it was possibly a weather balloon,Military checks revealed no aircraft or balloons reported in the area during the sighting,The sighting lasted for a total of approximately 30 minutes during which the object circled the field.
sighted object: An illuminated object possibly resembling a weather balloon
witness description: Weather observer, forecaster, and dispatcher from Bryan AFB
